title: Phenibut
summary: Phenibut, sold under the brand names Anvifen, Fenibut, and Noofen among others,[1] is a central nervous system depressant with anxiolytic effects, and is used to treat anxiety, insomnia, and for a variety of other indications.[5] It is usually taken by mouth as a tablet, but may be given intravenously.[4][5]
